author: Paul Dellevigne
description: A single malt whisky laced twist on a Boulevardier with Cynar replacing the familiar Italian red bitter liqueur.
name: Sin Cyn cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly STIR
